text: Chenyang Subdistrict () is a subdistrict of Hanshou County in Hunan, China. Dividing a portion of the former Longyang Town (), the subdistrict was established in December 2015. It has an area of with a population of about 35,000 (as of 2016). The subdistrict has 3 communities and 9 villages under its jurisdiction.according to About Chenyang Subdistrict / 辰阳街道(概况), hanshou.gov (2017-07-18) ==References== ==External links== * Website (Chinese / 中文) Category:Hanshou Category:Subdistricts of Hunan
title: Chenyang, Hanshou
